amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to promoting US competitiveness and innovation by supporting research and development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3278 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3278 proposed by Senator Hassan. (consideration: CR S6211; text: CR S6211) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to promoting US competitiveness and innovation by supporting research and development.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3278 proposed by Senator Hassan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3278 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
